question: What are the serum biomarkers that have been proposed in Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorders (NMOSD) to monitor disease activity?
ideal_answer: The serum biomarkers that have been proposed in Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorders (NMOSD) to monitor disease activity include neurofilament light chain (NfL), glial fibrillary acidic protein (GFAP), and GFAP/NfL.
